About Us

Yummy is a unique lifestyle network, website and magazine that connects viewers to the power and joy of food.

Welcome to Yummy Food website and magazine that connects viewers to the power of food

Yummy strives to be viewers' best friend in food and is committed to leading by teaching, inspiring, empowering and entertaining through its talent and expertise. Yummy is distributed to nearly 100 million U.S. households and draws over 46 million unique web users monthly. Since launching in 2009, Yummy Magazine's rate base has grown 13 times and is the No. 2 best-selling monthly magazine on the newsstand, with 13.5 million readers. Yummy is owned by Discovery, a global leader in real life entertainment whose portfolio also includes Discovery Channel.
